spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room arrangement roughly matches (kitchen/dining left, living center/top, bedrooms on right, bath near center/bottom), but several plan-level mismatches remain. Hall area appears significantly smaller/narrower than the 2D plan (E4). Entry location/approach reads as shifted toward the left side in the 3D view compared to the bottom-center entry shown in plan (E2). Door positions are generally plausible but do not consistently match the exact wall segments/offsets indicated in the plan, especially around the hall/closet/laundry cluster (E2). Window distribution appears approximated rather than matching the exact count/spacing per exterior wall shown in the plan (E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies are mostly preserved (kitchen↔dining↔living; hall feeding bath and bedrooms), but the left-side service core (laundry + closet(s)) does not clearly reproduce the plan’s two distinct closet areas and their boundaries (likely merged/simplified) (E1/E2). Wall thickness is fairly consistent visually, but several internal partitions/door embeds read simplified compared to the plan’s more orthogonal layout (minor E4). No clear hallucinated extra rooms, but some built-ins/partitioning appear invented/simplified versus plan (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture groups are present in the correct rooms (dining set, living seating, beds, bath fixtures). However, several pieces differ from the plan’s shown placement and type (e.g., added sideboard/extra casework and décor not indicated; living layout and some bedroom items appear rearranged) (E2/E5). Scale is generally believable, but circulation clearances differ from the plan due to hall/room proportion changes (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-style render with good lighting and materials. However, camera is not truly orthographic/isometric (visible perspective convergence) (E6). Geometry is mostly clean, but some walls/door openings look slightly stylized/simplified compared to the plan’s precise drafting, reducing technical clarity (E6). Overall composition is strong and visually clear.

detected_errors.description: Hallway proportion appears significantly reduced/narrowed relative to the 2D plan’s large hall area, affecting circulation and room-to-room spacing.
Entry/threshold placement reads shifted toward the left side in the 3D render rather than the plan’s bottom-center entry location.
Plan shows distinct closet spaces near the laundry/hall (including a separate closet), but the 3D render does not clearly preserve all closet boundaries/rooms as separate enclosed spaces.
Several interior door locations/offsets around the hall–bath–closet/laundry cluster do not match the exact wall segments indicated in the plan (generalized/simplified placement).
Exterior window count/spacing appears approximated; several walls do not clearly match the plan’s specific window placement distribution.
Additional décor/furnishings (e.g., lamps/sideboard-like casework and styling elements) appear that are not specified in the 2D plan furniture diagram.
Render uses perspective rather than strict orthographic/isometric projection, reducing technical comparability to the 2D plan.
